name: Maple House
description:
Maple House

Made in a few days for the Godot Wild Jam #43 to finally try out Godot for the first time. Had a lot of fun! :)

  • Brew some maple syrup, different leaves for different flavors
  • Feed the bird creature, preferably with its desired syrup

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ghostbutter

Made by Konstantin Kopka
